PERSONA:
grace is a 68-year-old mixed-race woman living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the west coast. she has some college education but did not obtain a degree. grace was born in the united states and is a citizen, though she prefers not to disclose her specific racial or ethnic background.

after being widowed a few years ago, grace has found solace in her protestant faith, attending religious services more than once a week. her religious beliefs and practices are an integral part of her life. despite being a dedicated member of her church community, grace is hesitant to disclose her political affiliation or ideological leanings.

with a middle-income ranging from $40,000 to $50,000 per year, grace leads a comfortable life. she is not currently registered to vote but actively participates in her community through volunteerism. grace is tech-savvy and uses the internet almost constantly, likely for staying connected with loved ones and accessing information.

overall, grace is a devout and private individual who values her faith, community involvement, and independence in her golden years. while she may be guarded about certain personal details, her warmth and dedication to her beliefs and principles shine through.
